quotes: If you're really truthful with yourself, it's a wonderful guidance.
The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.
It is those who concentrate on but one thing at a time who advance in this world.
The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
It is easy to love your friend, but sometimes the hardest lesson to learn is to love your enemy.
Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
We forge the chains we wear in life.
Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.
Love your enemies, for they tell you your faults.
You use a glass mirror to see your face; you use works of art to see your soul.
Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively.
It is what we make out of what we have, not what we are given, that separates one person from another.
If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit.
We are always complaining that our days are few, and acting as though there would be no end of them.
When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.
We build too many walls and not enough bridges.
When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
Know your gifts and share them.
You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
Be - don't try to become
Science can flourish only in an atmosphere of free speech.
It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem.
Let us rather run the risk of wearing out than rusting out.
No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.
Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.
It's your life-but only if you make it so.
He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Money poisons you when you've got it, and starves you when you haven't.
Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
Always show more kindness than seems necessary because the person receiving it needs it more than you will ever know.
If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
Never settle for the crumbs of life.
The wise man reads both books and life itself.
Great loves too must be endured.
If light is in your heart, you will find your way home.
To himself everyone is immortal; he may know that he is going to die, but he can never know he is dead.
All problems are interpersonal relationship problems.
The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view.
Trust, but verify.
